title: CandyMan Ziggs
body:
Name: CandyMan Ziggs!

Visuals: http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Odh8_Vcb1kA/UgQkS60QiPI/AAAAAAAAAnY/tgjp63IKIGc/s640/ziggs+candy.jpg There are the visuals as they are hard to explain

Ability Visuals!

His q Will Chuck a Wrapped Circular Lolipop  that explodes into shards of Candy

His w Will will be a Small Gummy bear that explodes into Jelly

His e will be Small Lollipops all different colours

His R Will be a Massive Cupcake that explodes into White icing 

PLEASE BUMP THIS IS THE BEST SKIN IDEA EVEREEEEEE

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Angelliss,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=moRkhMW1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-23T09:24:58.856+0000)
>
> bee keeper singed anyone?

Good idea !

Phobias tho.

It would effect people with Fears of Bees.

So no go.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=moRkhMW1,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-26T04:01:49.908+0000)
>
> Phobias tho.
> 
> It would effect people with Fears of Bees.
> 
> So no go.

They don't care, People are afraid of A spiders but we have urgot
lol that art tho {{champion:432}}  is fat
Cool, but why is rito giving Ziggs ANOTHER skin when someone champs have only one?
Yeah, champs that came out this year like Vel'Koz and Braum now have (or will soon be coming) 2 skins, whereas champs like Zac only have 1

> [{quoted}](name=KMKaos,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=moRkhMW1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-22T08:40:37.493+0000)
>
> Yeah, champs that came out this year like Vel'Koz and Braum now have (or will soon be coming) 2 skins, whereas champs like Zac only have 1

The only problem is that Zac is boring and they cant change much with him, But I do hope they make abominable snowman Zac like hes a clump of snow or something.

I would pref abominable Gnar personally ;)
pool party zac was the best idea ever! water effects would look cool (puddles for slime blobs) but sadly rito didnt make it...

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=moRkhMW1,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T00:05:18.870+0000)
>
> pool party zac was the best idea ever! water effects would look cool (puddles for slime blobs) but sadly rito didnt make it...

Yea  Rito Just make what they want they don't really care about the community suggestions

surprise party fiddle? void fizz?

its all about how big the idea becomes in the community. also, needs to be on a real server. not this %%%% hole.
Also project Yas was originally a player creation

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=moRkhMW1,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-24T01:41:03.603+0000)
>
> Also project Yas was originally a player creation

But they changed him heavily, He originally had a half mask, and his legs were like cyborg legs.

>The only problem is that Zac is boring and they cant change much with him,

We are talking about a walking Play-doh man. He can literally be anything we want him to be.

The Cold truth is that riot don't actually care whether the champ has less skins or lots! They are currently Making a new annie skin based on valentines day and a new katarina skin for warrior kingdoms, Yes I know im making one for a champion that has heaps of skins but if you have time look at my jinx one its schoolgirl jinx!
